choose_carefully: Выбирайте его внимательно. Вы не cможете изменить его позже
confirm_existence: Нам нужно знать, как с вами связаться
confirm_password: Введите свой пароль, чтобы подтвердить его.
enjoy_steem: You can now enjoy Vox and all its features.
error_api_create_account: An error occurred while creating the account
error_api_domain_blacklisted: This domain name is blacklisted. Please provide another email address
error_api_email_format: Please provide a valid email address
error_api_general: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later
error_api_phone_too_many: Too many attempts. Please request a new code
error_api_phone_used: This number is already linked to an existing account, or to an account still under review.
error_api_username_used: This username is already in use
error_api_wait: Please wait at least one minute between retries
error_api_actionlimit: You are doing that too much, please try again tomorrow
error_username_taken: The username you chose {username} has already been taken. Please choose another username.
error_validation_account_alpha: Account name should contain only letters, digits, periods, and dashes
error_validation_account_dash: Account name should contain only one dash in a row
error_validation_account_end: Account name should end with a letter or digit
error_validation_account_start: Each username segment should start with a letter
error_validation_account_segment_alpha: Each username segment should contain only letters, digits, and dashes
error_validation_account_segment_dash: Each username segment should contain only one dash in a row
error_validation_account_segment_end: Each username segment should end with a letter or digit
error_validation_account_segment_min: Each username segment should be longer
error_validation_account_segment_start: Each username segment should start with a letter
finish_text_1: After validating your signup request, we will look it over for approval. Please be patient, as it may take time to review the account. As soon as you're approved, you will be sent a link to finalize your account.
finish_text_2: You will be among the earliest members of the Vox community!
please_confirm: Please enter the code below to confirm it.
save_password_text: If you ever lose your password, your account will be irretrievably lost. We do not have your password, and we cannot help you recover it.
send_sms: We need to send you a quick text.
signup_username_right_text: A single Vox account gets you into all Vox-based apps
signup_username_right_title: One account is all you need
sms_code: We sent the code to you by SMS to {phoneNumber} {editLink}
username_available: Good news! The username {username} is available.
username_know: Начните с имени пользователя. Ваше имя пользователя - это то, как вы будете известны во всех приложениях на основе Vox.
username_know_steemit: Start with a username. Your username is how you'll be known on Vox and other Vox-based apps.
username_steemit_login: Do you already have an account? {link}
